name: Wedding
description: Experience the magic of a romantic wedding ceremony, where love and commitment unite under a canopy of stars. Create lasting memories in a breathtaking setting.

name: Birthday Party
description: Celebrate a special birthday with friends and family, filled with laughter, delicious food, and exciting surprises. Make this day one to remember.

name: Anniversary Party
description: Commemorate a milestone anniversary with loved ones in style. Enjoy a night of elegance, fine dining, and toasts to years of cherished memories.

name: Graduation Ceremony
description: Honor graduates' achievements in a formal, memorable ceremony. Join us as we applaud their hard work and dedication to shaping the future.

name: Family Reunion
description: Gather the family for a memorable reunion event filled with love, laughter, and nostalgia. Reconnect and create new cherished memories together.

name: Cultural Festival
description: Immerse yourself in the rich tapestry of cultures at our vibrant cultural festival. Enjoy diverse cuisine, music, and arts from around the world.

name: Networking Event
description: Connect and network with professionals in a relaxed setting. Foster valuable connections while enjoying a lively atmosphere and insightful discussions.

name: Corporate Retreat
description: Elevate your team's productivity and morale at our refreshing corporate retreat. Combine work and relaxation in a serene and inspiring environment.
